title: John's 68 Camaro
story: John's Mother special ordered the car new in 1968 and his Grandmother had signed the loan papers at the time. Shortly after the Camaro was delivered to the house John's Grandmother passed away and the insurance had paid off the loan (only one or two payments were made). The Camaro was driven daily and John remembers sitting on his parents lap behind the wheel. Jerry's Hot Rods performed the body restoration.
caption1: When picked up - In need of a TOTAL RESTORATION
caption2: Metal work; Body & Paint by Jerry's Hot Rods

title: Charlie's 67 Z/28 (1 of 602 Produced)
story: This original 1967 Z/28 (1 of 602 produced) was drag raced most of its life only showing 14000 miles on the odometer. The car went thru a total restoration with Lucas Restoration and Jerry's Hot Rods. This Camaro scored 99.5% percent in a 5000 point legend judging at the Camaro Nationals in June 2014. Charlie sent the Camaro back to Jerry's Hot Rod to Perform the final things to make the car 100%.
caption2: Charlie's car like it was delivered to Yenko Chevrolet only 47 Years Later

title: Nancy's 68 Z/28
story: Jerry's Hot Rods completely stripped the paint and restored it back to new
caption1: Stripping the paint on nancy's z
caption2: Body and paint by Jerry's Hot Rods

title: Dave's 1969 Z/28 Camaro
story: The sub frame was removed & engine rebuilt. The engine compartment was cleaned then painted and detailed before reassemble then certified by Jerrry MacNeish of Camaro Hi-performance

caption1: Body work done and first coat of primer applied

title: Jay's 68 SS/RS Camaro
story: After Jay bought the car he sent it to Lucas Restorations to have a few things done.The car was inspected and a lot of hidden damage was revealed. Jerry's Hot Rods replaced the complete front and trunk floors. The left quarter panel & tail light panel we also replaced.
caption1: As arrived to Jerry's Hot Rods
caption2: Installed Floors - Tail Light Panel - Quarter Panel.

title: Kathy's 66 Pony
story: Kathy's is having a great time riding her Little Pony around. When she is in the saddle she is 21 Again

title: Jerry's 34 Dodge Street Rod

title: Marks 69 Z/28
story: Mark shipped his car from DelMar Ca. to Jerry's Hot Rods to have his Z/28 restored.The original owner (Jack) was there to check the car out also.  Marks Z/28 score 98% in the Bow Tie Judging at the Camaro Nat. in 2012 and is qualified for the Legend Judging

story: Dave's car had only been painted a year when he decided to get the roof chopped. The car was covered and the roof was chopped so only the top need to be painted.
